parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from Page 1.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. If you do not specify the start time and end time, all the deployment task records of the edge instance are queried.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the edge instance. To obtain the instance ID, perform the following steps: Log on to the [Link IoT Edge console](https://iot.console.aliyun.com/le/instance/list). On the **Edge Instances** page, move the pointer over the name of the edge instance that you want to manage and obtain the instance ID.

You can also call the [QueryEdgeInstance](~~135214~~) operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Internet of Things (IoT) service instance. This parameter is not required for the public instance but required for Enterprise Edition instances.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 30. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. If you do not specify the start time and end time, all the deployment task records of the edge instance are queried.
